```{r}
windobs <- read_delim(here("data","raw","eKlima","obswind-stnr57710FLORO-20190604.txt"), 
                      delim = ";", na = "-9999", skip = 24) %>% 
  drop_na()
count(windobs, fDD)
count(windobs, fFF)
windobs <- filter(windobs, fDD == "OK" & fFF == "OK") %>% 
  select(-c("St.no", "fDD", "fFF"))

windobs %>% 
  group_by(Mnth) %>% 
  summarize(mean=mean(FF), sd=sd(FF))
```
